newsitem.title: MEXICO: ICA says wins $30 mln Chilean dam project.
newsitem.headline: ICA says wins $30 mln Chilean dam project.

text.p: Empresas ICA said on Tuesday it won a contract for about $30 million to build a dam in Chile.
In a statement, it said on February 18 Chile's copper giant Codelco granted it the contract to carry out civil construction works on the Overjeria dam, some 25 miles (45 kms) northeast of Santiago.

It said the ICA consortium would carry out 70 percent of the project and Chile's Empresas Constructora Tecsa the other 30 percent. The project would last 20 months and would include construction of the dam's retaining wall, tower, tunnel, aqueduct and drainage system.
